entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY, Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:47 a.m. MST Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind east 20 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy before morning then snow and local blowing snow. Wind east 20 km/h except gusting to 60 near the Richardson mountains before morning. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h except gusting to 60 near the Richardson mountains. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow. High minus 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 5 April 2023
